welcome_message_body: Welcome to Male, the charming and vibrant capital of the Maldives! Known for its stunning beaches, crystal-clear waters, and rich culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Lagoon Restaurant
restaurants.description: Lagoon Restaurant is a restaurant located in މާލެ.

restaurants.name: Symphony® Restaurant
restaurants.description: Symphony® Restaurant is a restaurant located in Male'.

restaurants.name: Sala Thai
restaurants.description: Sala Thai is a thai restaurant located in Male.

restaurants.name: Zeeba's Deli & Café
restaurants.description: Zeeba's Deli & Café is a café located in the city.

restaurants.name: Deep End
restaurants.description: Deep End is a seafood restaurant located in Maldives Island.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Malé International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Seaplane Terminal
terminals.description: The seaplane terminal at Malé International Airport caters to flights to and from the Maldives' many island resorts.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.
